page.title: 20S.Leics.Domesday Researchers
page.content: "I made a posy while the day ran by here will I smell my remmnant out and tie my life within this band...."{Geo- {rge Herbert,17th.C. Poet.}In some ways our contribution to this Project has been like that.We have encapsulated something of our lives in 1985 not within the allegorical terms of a band round a posy but within a micro-comp- uter disc.Limited as we have been by restrictions imposed by this massive national exercise we offer you-"Future Reader"-a glimpse,a mere precis of our lives.{John M. Gray.(Collator of this {contribution).{CONTRIBUTORS: Parklands {School-}Mr.R Simpkin(Deputy Head),Mrs S.Russell(Teacher),Classes S & V 7-8yr children,(Parental Helpers) Mrs.Cowan & Mrs Lewis.{ Stokes School-}Messrs JM Gray(Deputy Head),L.Richards,N.Hughes, D.Riddington.Class J4G.10-11Yrs.Mrs GH Evitt(Head).Mrs S Nicolls.(Parent).
